The article falsely claims that Presiden: s executive order mandates the apprehension and detention of Americans who merely show signs of respiratory illness. The expert's verdict clarifies that the executive order is more targeted and is not aimed at Ebola specifically.
The expert: s verdict explains that the update to the executive order was actually aimed at Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS), which is a respiratory illness that matches the updated language of the order. This further discredits the claim made in the article.
